config.name: Joomla-Login
config.author: Team readyBytes
config.description: Allow user to Login with Joomla Login action.
config.help: With reference to the example code, you need to enter name of the fields in Username and Password parameters that are username and password.
config.code:
<form name="form_name" method="POST" action="form_post_url" >

		Username :   <input type="text" size="15" name="username" />

		Password :   <input type="password" size="15" name="password" />

				      <input type="submit" name="submit" value="Submit" />

</form>
